bs-socialblog-toc-useblogteaser: Usar un extracto del texto pro articulos de blog in le chronologia
bs-social-notifications-blog-create: Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha create}} un nove blog "$3"
bs-social-notifications-email-blog-creat: Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha create}} un nove blog "$3"

Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha create}} un nove blog "$3" con le sequente texto:

$4
bs-social-notifications-blog-edit: Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha modificate}} le blog "$3"
bs-social-notifications-email-blog-edit-: Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha modificate}} le blog "$3"

Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha modificate}} le blog "$3" Le nove texto es:

$4
bs-social-notifications-blog-delete: Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha delite}} le blog "$3"
bs-social-notifications-email-blog-delet: Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha delite}} le blog "$3"
Le usator {{GENDER:$1|$2 ha delite}} le blog "$3"
bs-socialblog-toc-useblogteaser-help: In le formulario del blog, usatores pote entrar un texto de extracto cliccante sur le symbolo de rota dentate. Si es activate, iste texto de extracto appare sur le pagina Special:Timeline in loco del prime parte del articulo de blog mesme.
bs-socialblog-config-mainlinks-blog-help: Monstrar le ligamine del puncto de entrata “Blog” in le navigation al sinistra
bs-socialblog-groupblog-permission-error: Le usator non es autorisate a exequer le action
bs-social-event-blog-create: {{GENDER:$1|ha create}} un nove articulo de blog “$2”
